channel.title: MI 3 / Mi 4 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: MI 3 / Mi 4 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI 8.3.1 Recovery update for MI 3 Global
item.description:
New Weekly Recovery update available!

Device: MI 3 Global

Codename: cancro

Version: 8.3.1 | 6.0

Size: 855.8 MB

MD5: b992dfbc341cf7c1ab71c5ecdf8a0596

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Fix - Mobile phone random reboot when using MI mover and MI drop(02-27)
Fix - Missing Titles for 'Bookmark' & 'Manage Downloads' for Text Size M(02-27)
Fix - Colored notifications don't display correctly(02-27)

Download: Here
